attributes.action: petition to call for gregory campbell to be sacked
attributes.additional_details: Gregory Campbell, an MP mocked the Irish nation by making fun of the Irish language whilst addressing the Northern Ireland Assembly. He refuses to apologise. Is that what we can expect of our MPs? Racist and sectarian behaviour cannot be tolerated in any society, let alone be committed and endorsed by our MPs. As Mr Campbell will not apologise, he should be sacked.
